summary: A movie special effects man is hired to fake a real-life mob killing for a witness protection plan, but finds his own life in danger.
cast: Bryan Brown|Brian Dennehy|Diane Venora|Cliff De Young|Mason Adams|Jerry Orbach|Joe Grifasi|Martha Gehman|Roscoe Orman|Trey Wilson|Tom Noonan|Paul D'Amato|Jossie DeGuzman|Jean De Baer|M'el Dowd|Tim Gallin|Patrick Stack|John Doumanian|Ray Iannicelli|Ed Crowley|Gibby Brand|Jim Elliott|Christopher Curry|Jim Lovelett|George Kodisch|Jim Cordes|Richard Hayes|Christopher McHale|James Pickens Jr.|Michael Fischetti|Angela Bassett|Yolanda Lloyd|Marvin Beck|John McLoughlin|Jim Babchak|Bernie Friedman|Drummond Erskine|Joe Pentangelo|Gerald Campbell|Kevin Deon|Ron Turek
keywords: fake assassination|faked death|film within a film|special effects|fake murder
title: F/X, efectos mortales
